metadata.name: Are you alone, too?
metadata.description:
Even though I have friends and family, sometimes I suddenly feel lonely.

But there are times when just a little thing can save your heart a little.

I'm always happy if my works can save your heart even a little.

友人や家族がいても、時折ふと孤独を感じることがあります。

ほんのちょっとしたことで心が少し救われることもありますよね。
私の作品が少しでも心の救いになれていたら嬉しいなといつも思っています。

© Copyright is fully owned by artist Tatsumi Tsurushima. Buyer of this NFT may use the image
(1) for personal and non-commercial purposes.
(2) as a profile picture on SNS such as Twitter.
